about_the_game:
NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim!

Play Episode 1 Free on Steam!

Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

This is an open-ended series with no ending planned. It's like a TV show that will continue until it's canceled.

The twists and turns weave ever darker as our two main characters are running out of people to trust. Is the entire black ops site compromised? Commander Jackson's behavior grows stranger and stranger!

Tide can't help but believe that Wraith's intimacy with him wasn't just about taking the serum's edge off. The experience leaves him convinced that his feelings for Wraith are reciprocated.

But before he can broach the subject, Balasque has gone missing, and so have the two extremely dangerous hostiles!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of explicit sexual content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or Higher
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Monster Ops 4

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
